pli-tv-bu-vb-sk65:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk65:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū pallatthikāya nisinnassa dhammaṁ desenti …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk65:1.3.1_0: “Na pallatthikāya nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṁ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk65:1.4_0: Na pallatthikāya nisinnassa agilānassa dhammo desetabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk65:1.5_0: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca hatthapallatthikāya vā dussapallatthikāya vā nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṁ deseti,
